Controllers¶

The camera module¶

Used to manage the camera

class camera.Camera(model)¶
The camera is composed of :
>>> 1 model world
>>> 1 camera (PiCamera object)
>>> 1 road follower object
run()¶

Run function of the thread. The function that is launch when we start the thread.

stop()¶

Allow to stop the thread and quit it.

The check distance module¶

Used to reset the distance with band on the road checking

class checkDistance.CheckDistance(model, band_xcoord)¶
The CheckDistance is composed of :
>>> 1 model : The world, model of the car and their environment
>>> 1 band_xcoord : shared value with video process
run()¶

Run function of the thread. The function that is launch when we start the thread.

stop()¶

Allow to stop the thread and quit it.

The color detector module¶

Used to manage the detection of the color of the road.

class color_detector.ColorFilter¶

This class provides a simple method for color filtering based on the HSV color space, the image sample needs to be blurred before being passed to this filter

color_thresholds¶
Getter:Gets the lower and upper threshold for color filtering
Type:array of two numpy arrays
display(raw_img=True)¶

Display the mask and the raw image :param raw_img: if True, the raw image will be displayed :type raw_img: boolean

img¶
Getter:Gets the image before filtered
Type:
mask¶
Getter:Gets the mask after processing
Type:
process()¶

Start processing

The PreloadedPaths module¶

Used to manage the processing of the paths

class preloadedPath.PreloadedPaths(model)¶
The PreloadedPaths is composed of :
>>> 1 model world
>>> 1 list of paths
>>> 1 current path
bend(direction)¶

ALlow to turn an 90° angle on the right or on the left. The turn has to begin 120cm before the bend.

Parameters:direction (int) – the direction to turn (-1 : right, 1 : left)
distance_management(distance, distance_traveled)¶

Manage the distance. If a bend is detected we update the distance_traveled to be more precise. If the distance ordered by the instruction is reach we can go to the next instruction.

Parameters:
  • distance (int) – distance to reach
  • distance_traveled (float) – distance traveled by the car
move_car(action, speed, distance)¶

Move the car according to the action (forward, backward, turn left, turn right)

Parameters:
  • action (FORWARD, BACKWARD, TURN_LEFT, TURN_RIGHT) – action to execute
  • speed (int) – speed for moving backward or forward
  • distance (int) – the distance to traveled
run()¶

Run function of the thread. The function that is launch when we start the thread. Control the progress of the path.

start_path(index)¶

Allow to choose the index of the path we want to follow

Parameters:index (int) – the index of the path
stop()¶

Allow to stop the thread and quit it. In this case we stop the car

stop_car(sleep_time)¶

Stop the car during the time indicated.

Parameters:sleep_time (float) – time to stop in seconds
stop_path()¶

Allow to stop the path at any moment. In this case the car stop.

The road follower module¶

Used to manage the car to stay in the center of the road

class road_follower.RoadFollower¶
compute_deviation()¶
display_masks()¶
filter()¶
set_thresholds(v_thresh, h_thresh)¶
update_frame(image)¶

The Stm module¶

Used to handle the communication between the RaspberryPi and the STM32.

class StmController.StmController(model)¶

Start a new thread commuincating with the STM32 and define its behaviour.

The stmController is composed of :
>>> 1 model world
>>> spi communication information
static bin2dec(s)¶

Transform a string of binary number in integer

Parameters:s (str) – the string of binary number
static dec2bin(d, nb=8)¶

Transform an interger in string of binary number

Parameters:
  • d (int) – the integer to transform
  • nb (int) – the number of bits to encode the integer
frameToModel(dataReceived)¶

Used to translate a frame received from the STM to update the model

Model of the frame v.1 :
>>>  -----------------------------------------------------------
>>> | 00..00 | Distance | UltrasoundSensors | Battery | AckByte |
>>> -----------------------------------------------------------
Model for the battery:
>>>  ---------------------------------------
>>> | 0..0 (7 bites) | 0/1 (charged or not) |
>>>  ---------------------------------------
Parameters:dataReceived (str) – The received frame
get_ack_byte()¶

Return the ack byte according to the different information of the car

>>> -------------------------------------------------------------
>>> | 00 | 00 | 00 | 00 | 00 | 00 | reset distance | ack distance |
>>>  -------------------------------------------------------------
Returns:The ack byte
Return type:int
modelToFrame()¶

Used to translate the model into a frame that can be sent to the STM32

Model of the frame :
>>>  --------------------------------------------------------
>>> | FrontMotor | rearLeftMotor | rearRightMotor | 00....00 |
>>>  --------------------------------------------------------
Returns:The frame to be sent
Return type:str
run()¶

Run function of the thread. The function that is launch when we start the thread.

set_ack_byte(ack_byte)¶

Update the different information of the car according to the ack byte

>>>  -------------------------------------------------------------
>>> | 00 | 00 | 00 | 00 | 00 | 00 | reset distance | ack distance |
>>>  -------------------------------------------------------------
Parameters:ack_byte (int) – the ack byte received
stop()¶

Allow to stop the thread and quit it

static to_chr(n)¶

Transform an integer in character

Parameters:n (int) – the number to Transform

The window module¶

Used to handle the communication between the user and the RaspberryPi.

class window.Window(model, preloadPath)¶
checkSensor(sensor)¶

Perform analysis on the sensor before displaying on the RasPi
